[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-text-canvas](./harp-text-canvas.md) &gt; [TextCanvas](./harp-text-canvas.textcanvas.md) &gt; [addText](./harp-text-canvas.textcanvas.addtext.md)

## TextCanvas.addText() method

Adds the input text to this `TextCanvas` in the specified screen position. The current \[\[TextRenderStyle\]\] and \[\[TextLayoutStyle\]\] will influence the results of this function.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addText(text: string | GlyphData[], position: THREE.Vector3, params?: AdditionParameters): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  text | string \| [GlyphData](./harp-text-canvas.glyphdata.md)<!-- -->\[\] | Input text. Provide an array of \[\[GlyphData\]\] for better performance. |
|  position | THREE.Vector3 | Screen position. |
|  params | [AdditionParameters](./harp-text-canvas.additionparameters.md) | Optional addition parameters. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

Result of the addition. If `false`<!-- -->, some error occurred during execution and the input text couldn't be properly added.
